testimonials.author: Nancy Swanson
testimonials.title: President, Springfield Country Club
testimonials.quote: Leverage agile frameworks to provide a robust synopsis for high level overviews. Iterative approaches to corporate strategy foster collaborative thinking to further the overall value proposition. Organically grow the holistic world view of disruptive innovation via workplace diversity and empowerment.

testimonials.author: Joe Malonagi
testimonials.title: General Manager, Springfield Tower
testimonials.quote: The complexities and challenges AlphaConstruction successfully overcame on our behalf includes substantial permit obstacles, coordination and selection support of all design and finish materials, and the diffculty of integrating existing and new structures.
